section.title: About this Manual
section.para: This manual is about &MiKTeX;: the purpose of this manual is not to give an introduction into the world of &TeX;. If you are not familiar with using &TeX; (and Friends), then please consider reading one of the tutorials available on the Internet.

section.title: How to Get &MiKTeX;
section.para: The &MiKTeX; distribution can be downloaded from the Internet. And it is available on &DVDdashR;.

section.title: Downloading &MiKTeX;
section.para: There &MiKTeX; setup program comes in two flavors:

You use the &BasicMiKTeXInstaller; to install a basic &MiKTeX; system. The &MiKTeXNetInstaller; can be used to download and install a complete &MiKTeX; system. All this is explained later in this manual (see ).

section.title: &MiKTeX; on &DVDdashR;
section.para: The &MiKTeX; &DVDdashR; allows you to install &MiKTeX; on the hard-disk or to run the programs directly from the &DVDdashR;.

If you wish to obtain a copy of the &MiKTeX; &DVDdashR;, visit the &DVDdashR; info page.

section.title: Give Back
section.para: If you enjoy &MiKTeX; and want to support the project, then please become an esteemed &MiKTeX; user by giving back something. It encourages me to continue, and is the perfect way to say thank you!

Visit the &MiKTeX; Give Back page, for more information.

section.para: There is a discussion list for &MiKTeX; users. You can join this list by visiting the MiKTeX-Users Info Page and filling out the form provided there.
